abstrac: PCB, PCB layout, Board layout, Altium Designer, Eagle, Multilayer, Rigid-Flex, Electronics, IoT, Power Electronis,BLE, BGA, FPGA, SoC, DDR, USB, Impedance Control, 3D, Electrical Engineer
bio:
My name is Alexander, I'm a professional PCB designer. I have 10+ years of experience in electronics. I specialize in high density, high speed and high power PCB layout. If you already have a circuit diagrams, I'm ready to perform PCB layout for any of your project.

Skills:
- Altium Designer, Eagle, CAM350, Saturn PCB
- Layout for fast circuits: USB, DDR, Ethernet, PCI-Express, LVDS etc
- Layout for power circuits: inverters, motor conrtollers, battery charges etc
- Use of high-tech BGA packages
- Multilayer, rigid-flex, metal-based PCB
- Buried and blind VIAs, impedance control
- Schematic symbols and PCB footprint library creation
- Back engineering, preparing files for production
- Projects import and export, transfer data between EDA programs
- Organization of mass PCB production and assembly

Experience:
- Director, PCB-Master, 2007 - Present
- Leader Engineer, HTS-Spb, 1999 - 2007
- Electronic Equipment Engineer, St-Pb State Medical University, 1993 - 
1999

Education:
- Bachelor's degree, St-Petersburg State Electrotechnical University, Russian Federation, 1986 - 1993

The base price for all customers and urgent work is  $30 per hour. If you prefer a fixed payment I will offer you the cost and the expected completion date. If you have any questions, please contact me.
